import math

N = int(input())

# N = A * B
# log10(N) = log10(A) + log10(B)
# log10(A) = log10(N) - log10(B)
# A = 10^(log10(N) - log10(B))

# A = 10^(log10(N) - log10(B))
# log10(A) = log10(10^(log10(N) - log10(B)))
# log10(A) = log10(N) - log10(B)
# log10(A) + log10(B) = log10(N)
# log10(A * B) = log10(N)
# A * B = N

# log10(A) + log10(B) = log10(N)
# log10(A) = log10(N) - log10(B)
# A = 10^(log10(N) - log10(B))

# F(A,B) = max(log10(A), log10(B))
# F(A,B) = max(log10(10^(log10(N) - log10(B))), log10(B))
# F(A,B) = max(log10(N) - log10(B), log10(B))
# F(A,B) = max(log10(N), log10(B))
# F(A,B) = log10(N)

print(math.floor(math.log10(N)))

import math

n = int(input())

ans = math.ceil(math.log10(n))

print(ans)
